channel.title: Message -Need help-
channel.description:
Can someone help me, how to get a automatic message in about every 15 minutes? something like this: SendMessageToAll("BLAH BLAH BLAH"); (IDK if this is a real code) Actiontimer == 900; (this is not a good code)
Can someone make for me a real code?? and say where to put?

item.title: Message -Need help-
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Give me a hint where to put
xD

[code] Timer timer = new Timer();

timer.scheduleAtFixedRate(new TimerTask() {
        public void run() {
            for(Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
                if(p != null) {
                    sendMessage("Send Message?");
                }
            }
        }
    }, 0,  900000);[/code]

Antilag or something?

Read full topic

item.title: Message -Need help-
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“C4ll3r, post:1, topic:270382”]Can someone help me,
how to get a automatic message in about every 15 minutes?
something like this:
SendMessageToAll(“BLAH BLAH BLAH”); (IDK if this is a real code)
Actiontimer == 900; (this is not a good code)

Can someone make for me a real code??
and say where to put?[/quote]

    Timer timer = new Timer();
    
    timer.scheduleAtFixedRate(new TimerTask() {
            public void run() {
                for(Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
                    if(p != null) {
                        sendMessage("Send Message?");
                    }
                }
            }
        }, 0,  900000);

You’ll have to find where to put it.
